summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of S.W. Kenyon St. from 9th Ave. S.W. to approximately 130 feet east thereof and from approximately 130 feet west of 7th Ave. S.W. to 1st Ave. S.; and certain other streets, avenues, alleys and easements; by constructing sanitary sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; and doing such other work as may be necessary in connection therewith; all in accordance with Resolution No. 25286 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
